treasury_media.title: 5 meest gemaakte fouten binnen IT-recruitment
treasury_media.description: In deze video legt Daniël uit wat de 5 meest gemaakte fouten binnen IT-recruitment zijn. Voorkom dat je bij het aantrekken van IT-talent een van deze fouten maakt!

school.name: Pontifícia Universidade Católica de São Paulo

education.field_of_study: Business administration / Bedrijfskunde / Business management / Bedrijfsmanagement

education.degree_name: Minor: Doing business in Latin America

awards.title: L'Oréal Branstorm Challenge 2019
awards.description: The L’Oréal Brandstorm Challenge is an annual innovation competition in which over 40,000 students from 63 countries pitch their innovative ideas. In 2019 the goal of the competition was to invent the future skincare experience for health-conscious consumers. My two team members and I made it to the Campus Finals, which meant that we were given the opportunity to present our concept at the headquarters of L’Oréal Netherlands on 19 March 2019. It was an unforgettable experience.

awards.title: Best bachelor thesis of the International Business and Languages (IBL) graduates of 2015
awards.description: My bachelor thesis called "Kleurrijke kansen"​ (Colourful opportunities), written for Helloprint B.V., was awarded the award for "Best bachelor thesis of the IBL course in 2015". My thesis was awarded the 1st place by a commission of 10 people (consisting of RBS lecturers, entrepreneurs and ex-IBL students).

profile_positions.description:
As a guest lecturer, I gave students who followed the minor Digital Marketing practical insights into the field of marketing. So far, I have given two guest lectures:

1. March 2020: Employer branding - the key in winning the 'war on talent'.
2. November 2020: Data-driven marketing - the key to winning agency pitches and achieving marketing success.
3. April 2021: Data-driven marketing - the key to winning agency pitches and achieving marketing success.
4. November 2021: CRO - how to use hypotheses to validate ideas.
5. May 2022: Using CRO to go from data to actionable insights.
6. October 2022: Data-driven marketing - how to properly use data.

I plan on giving more guest lectures in 2023.
profile_positions.title: Guest Lecturer - minor Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
•	Content marketing: thinking about new content formats, helping with the creation of content (videos, blog articles, whitepapers, e-books, etc.), developing a content marketing strategy catering to different parts of the marketing funnel. 
•	Web analytics: monthly performance reports for clients, giving them insights into the performance of their website and/or digital campaigns. 
•	Presenting: turning performance reports into compact PowerPoints/Keynotes with actionable insights, which I present to clients. 
•	SEO: improving the crawlability and indexability of the websites of clients (for search engines).  
•	SEA: setting up, managing, and optimizing Google Ads.
•	Social advertising: setting up, managing, and optimizing Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, and LinkedIn Ads. 
•	Email marketing: setting up email marketing (with automated workflows) in Sendinblue.
•	CRO: using heatmaps (Hotjar), user recordings (Hotjar, Usabilla), and polls to validate ideas. Briefing designers and developers on how to improve the (landing)page. 
•	Trend research: researching relevant marketing and tech trends.
•	Market research: researching potential clients in different markets.  

Clients I worked for: DIQQ, Vaqancies, Rebels, Sqales.
profile_positions.title: Digital Campaign Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Content marketing: thinking about new content formats, helping with the creation of content (videos, blog articles, whitepapers, e-books, etc.), developing a content marketing strategy catering to different parts of the marketing funnel. 
•      Social media: assisting with creating content for the social media channels.
•	Web analytics: monthly performance reports of the website.
•	Presenting: turning performance reports into compact Powerpoints/Keynotes with actionable insights. 
•	YouTube: presenting tips and tricks about recruitment, candidate experience, and employer branding in short videos.
•	SEO: improving the crawlability and indexability of the website. 
•	CRO: using heatmaps (Hotjar), user recordings (Hotjar, Usabilla), and polls to validate ideas.
•	Trend research: researching relevant marketing and tech trends.
•	Market research: researching potential clients in different markets.

profile_positions.description:
As a Sales & Digital Marketing Consultant I was responsible for:
1) 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴: I was responsible for the digital marketing of Zicht online (now Fabrique) and its clients. Specialties: 
- Strategy: determining KPIs and SMART objectives.
- Search: organic search (SEO) & paid search (SEA; Google Ads, Facebook Ads).
- Website analytics: Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Tag Manager, Mouseflow, Hotjar.
- Email marketing: MailChimp, Active Campaign, HubSpot.
- Conversion rate optimization (CRO): Google PageSpeed Insights, Hotjar, Mouseflow, Google Optimize (for A/B testing).
- Content marketing: creating an inbound marketing strategy & writing segment-specific whitepapers.
- Social media marketing: Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn.
- Client dashboards: Klipfolio, Google Data Studio.

2) 𝗦𝗮𝗹𝗲𝘀: my tasks included identifying new clients and customer segments, cold calling potential clients, arranging face-to-face meetings with potential clients, participating in agency pitches, etc. 

CRMs used: Pipedrive & Salesforce.

Clients I worked with: 
Zuid-Hollands Landschap, Middin, Kröller-Müller Museum, Museumvereniging, Concertgebouw Brugge, ArtEZ Hogeschool voor de Kunsten, Donner, Diabetesfonds, Knauf, Brabants Historisch Informatie Centrum, Stadsarchief Rotterdam, Laurens, Amstelring and Mokveld.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Digital Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
𝗙𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗟𝗶𝗳𝗲 𝗦𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝗔𝗺𝗯𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗣𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽. Four Life Sciences was a completely new branch within Ambitious People Group. Jeffrey and I hired two new colleagues and set up this new label from scratch. As a recruitment consultant, I was responsible for mediating professionals in the Dutch food industry. 

𝗕𝗶𝗴𝗴𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: I helped to build up a new recruitment label from scratch.
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Consultant | Food Industry | Rotterdam

profile_positions.description:
𝗟𝗠𝗛 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝘀 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝗔𝗺𝗯𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗣𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽. As a recruitment consultant, I was responsible for mediating Sales Engineers, sales professionals with a background in various technical sectors, in Belgium. 

𝗕𝗶𝗴𝗴𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: I helped to set up a new branch (Sales Engineers) in the Belgian market & I managed to set a new record for the biggest deal ever concluded.
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Consultant | Sales Engineers | Antwerpen

profile_positions.description:
During my bachelor thesis, I focused on Helloprint's new branch in Spain (located in Valencia). During my thesis, I worked closely with the Chief Marketing Officer and the Spanish Country Manager. I wrote a strategic marketing plan advising Helloprint's Valencia office on how to successfully expand its presence in the Spanish online printing market. 

Key to formulating this strategy where:
- Internal analysis of Helloprint
- External analysis of the Spanish online printing industry
- Marketing mix (using the 4 C's)
- Sales strategy and forecast

My thesis was evaluated by both Helloprint and Rotterdam Business School. Thesis grade: 8.0 (out of 10). 𝗪𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗮𝘄𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗕𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗜𝗕𝗟 𝗧𝗵𝗲𝘀𝗶𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝟮𝟬𝟭𝟱.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Graduate Intern
